channel.title: Kompas Podcast
channel.description: A podcast discussing various topics related to sports, culture, and history.

item.title: Nenad Zimonjić o Janiku Sineru i doping aferi
item.description: Discussion about the impact of doping allegations on athletes' careers.

item.title: Nenad Zimonjić — Tenis je najčistiji sport / Podkast Kompas 43
item.description: Nenad Zimonjić discusses the integrity of tennis and the role of doping.

item.title: Najava: Nenad Zimonjić — Tenis je najčistiji sport
item.description: Announcement for the upcoming episode featuring Nenad Zimonjić.

item.title: Knez Lazar je koristio vatreno oruzje u Kosovskoj bitki
item.description: Exploring the historical context of Knez Lazar's use of firearms.
